module.name: StaticContentSample
module.param: TThis dashboard provides Windows PerfMon information regarding Network utilization for the selected Desktop. Clicking on the hostname below will take you to a list of the running processes for that machine. To view the entire result set or for this report or manipulate the data further, click on the View Full Report link below.

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats values(vm_name) as vm latest(_time) as f last(_time) as l earliest(_time) as junk__time | `remove_junk` | eval message = vm + " From: " + f + " to " + l | eval range="vmsreporting"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="*Bytes Sent*" | stats max(Value) as max | eval max = round(max,2) | eval range="netup"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="*Bytes Sent*" | stats avg(Value) as avg| eval avg = round(avg,2) | eval range="netup"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="*Bytes Sent*" | stats min(Value) as min | eval min = round(min,2) | eval range="netup"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | eval type = if(counter=="Bytes Sent/sec","send","recv") | eval send = if(type=="send",Value,"") | eval recv = if(type=="recv",Value,"") | eval recv = round(recv,2) | eval send = round(send,2) | rename vm_name as "Virtual Machine" | stats max(send) as "Bytes Sent/sec" max(recv) as "Bytes Received" by "Virtual Machine"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="*Bytes Received*" | stats max(Value) as max | eval max = round(max,2) | eval range="netdown"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="*Bytes Received*" | stats avg(Value) as avg | eval avg = round(avg,2) | eval range="netdown"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="*Bytes Received*" | stats min(Value) as min | eval range="netdown"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search `HIGHNETSEND` | eval type = if(counter=="Bytes Sent/sec","send","recv") | eval send = if(type=="send",Value,"") | rename vm_name as "Virtual Machine" | stats max(send) as "Bytes Sent/sec" by "Virtual Machine" | head 10

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search `HIGHNETRECV` | eval type = if(counter=="Bytes Sent/sec","send","recv") | eval recv = if(type=="recv",Value,"") | rename vm_name as "Virtual Machine" | stats max(recv) as "Bytes Received/sec" by "Virtual Machine" | head 10

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | eval type = if(counter=="Bytes Sent/sec","send","recv") | eval send = if(type=="send",Value,"") | eval recv = if(type=="recv",Value,"") | stats max(send) as "Bytes Sent/sec" max(recv) as "Bytes Received/sec" by _time| head 10
